text: Ngempela umvuzo walabo abalwa noMvelinqangi nesithunywa sakhe futhi bandisa ukona emhlabeni kuphela ukuthi babulawe noma banqanyulezwe noma banqunywe izandla zabo nezinyawo zabo ezinhlangothini ezahlukene noma badingiswe ezweni, lokho kuyisihlambalazo kubona kulomhlaba futhi okwabo empilweni ezayo kuyoba yisijeziso esikhulu
